entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Morden
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:33 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -26.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Morden AAFC 08:00 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023
Temperature: -26.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -35
Dewpoint: -29.7°C
Wind: WNW 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023
